author: maxb
msg: * STATUS: Add r9338 and r9340 and vote for them - trivial build.conf changes.

author: jpieper
msg: Allow importing and exporting of special files.  This also completes
the changes made in r10117 by not setting timestamps on special files
when exporting.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/subst.c
(detranslate_special_file): Move so that it occurs before
create_special_file.
(create_special_file): When exporting from a working copy, this
function can be called with an actual special file as the source.
In this event, create a temporary detranslation from which the
special file is created.
* subversion/libsvn_client/export.c
(copy_versioned_files): If we are exporting a special file, do not
set the timestamp.  Also use the new
svn_subst_copy_and_translate2.
(struct file_baton): Add a special field to keep track of whether
the file has the svn:special property set.
(change_file_prop): Update the file_baton's special field when
necessary.
(close_file): Check for special files when invoking working copy
translation, and use the new svn_subst_copy_and_translate2.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(send_file_contents): Check for special files when invoking working
copy translation, and use the new svn_subst_copy_and_translate2.
(import_file): Add the svn:special property to files that are
detected as non-normal.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/special_tests.py
(import_export_symlink): New test that imports and exports a
symlink.

author: jpieper
msg: Fix several bugs related to manually adding a svn:special property to
a pre-existing file.  Also, properly re-translate working copy files
when reverting changes to one of the "magic" properties.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(revert_admin_things): If there were property changes, check to see
if one of the magic properties were among them.  If so, do not
check for file modification and always re-run the working copy
translation code.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(install_file): Add SVN_PROP_SPECIAL as one of the magic properties
that will trigger a working copy file regeneration on update.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/subst.c
(detranslate_special_file): Fix a typo that was causing src_stream
to be created from the destination file, not the source file.
(svn_subst_copy_and_translate2): If the source file is a special
file, treat it as if the special parameter was TRUE.

author: breser
msg: Make the fix in r9814 easier to read per Philip Martin's suggestion.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c
Move setting of slash to 1 closer to where we set it to 0.

author: jpieper
msg: Since some special files (namely symlinks) cannot easily have their
modification time changed, disable modification time updating for all
special devices.  Theoretically there could be some use for having
commit times tracked for other device files, but the work for that can
be done when it is deemed necessary.
Notably this does not fix the export cases.  Since exporting special
files doesn't work currently anyway, I'll save that for a later fix.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c
* subversion/libsvn_wc/log.c
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(restore_file, log_do_file_timestamp, revert_admin_things): Only
change the modified time if the file is not special.
